alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 3:13PM CST until February 21 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Texas County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 11 AM to 9 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
